official.headline: Halden Passes Quietly
official.anchor_line: Marek Halden, architect of Stenograd’s Behavioral Compliance Index, has died at his Tower 9 residence.
official.contextual_reframing: Halden designed the BCI, which ensures city order and smooth access to essential services by monitoring citizen data in real time. The system secures citywide harmony and will continue under Council stewardship.

official.headline: Efficient Leadership Transition
official.anchor_line: Authorities announce steady guidance by the Council following Halden’s passing; no disruption to city services.
official.contextual_reframing: The Council, selected via performance metrics and system merit, upholds continuous governance. Stability and innovation remain priorities through automated coordination.

official.headline: BCI Maintains City Flow
official.anchor_line: Officials highlight the Behavioral Compliance Index for keeping daily life orderly, rewarding trusted residents and supporting public well-being.
official.contextual_reframing: The BCI analyzes behavior scores using health, financial, and transit data, giving secure access to services. This transparent system is a cornerstone of Stenograd's resilience and safety.

underground.headline: BCI Architect Found Dead
underground.anchor_line: Marek Halden, the man behind the city’s digital leash—the BCI—is dead in his locked suite.
underground.contextual_reframing: That’s the original engineer of the Behavioral Compliance Index. Halden’s death smells like quiet cleanup—no clear answers, no investigation. Is this how they erase those who know too much?

underground.headline: System Glitches Spread
underground.anchor_line: Citywide delays and access glitches hit as the BCI stutters without its creator.
underground.contextual_reframing: The Behavioral Compliance Index is more than a scorecard—it decides who gets housing, jobs, medical care. Now, flagged citizens are vanishing from lists, networks freeze, and the Council stays silent.

underground.headline: Council Calls Silence Stability
underground.anchor_line: The Council issues a one-line statement and keeps the public in the dark, naming no replacement.
underground.contextual_reframing: Remember, this Council isn’t elected: the system promotes its own, using secret ‘performance’ scores. Right now, even those at the top are scrambling for control as the machines run on without their master.
